Package com.ibm.streams.management.resource

Interface ResourceTag

public interface ResourceTag
ResourceTag contains information about resource tag. Resource tags are added to resources to influence how resources are chosen to run Streams services and applications.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    ResourceTag.ReservedTag
    Enumeration for the reserved resource tags defined by Streams.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the name of the resource tag.
      Returns:
      the resource tag name.

    • getDescription

      String getDescription()
      Returns a description for the resource tag.
      Returns:
      the resource tag description.

    • isDefinitionFormatProperties

      boolean isDefinitionFormatProperties()
      Identifies whether the resource tag definition is expressed as a set of name/value properties. If the value is true, the definition can be retrieved by calling getDefinitionAsProperties(). If the value is false, the definition has a custom format and can be retrieved as an unprocessed string by calling getDefinitionAsCustomFormat(). The custom format is defined by the external resource manager.
      Returns:
      the tag definition format indicator

    • getDefinitionAsProperties

      Map<String,String> getDefinitionAsProperties()
      Returns the resource tag definition as a set of name/value properties. Null is returned if isDefinitionFormatProperties() is false.
      Returns:
      the resource tag definition.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.

    • getDefinitionAsCustomFormat

      String getDefinitionAsCustomFormat()
      Returns the resource tag definition for a tag with a custom format. The tag definition is returned as an unprocessed string. The custom format is defined by the external resource manager. Null is returned if isDefinitionFormatProperties() is true.
      Returns:
      the resource tag definition.

    • isReserved

      boolean isReserved()
      Indicates whether the resource tag name is defined by Streams.
      Returns:
      true if the tag name is defined by Streams.
      See Also:
      • ResourceTag.ReservedTag
